summary: A set of low‑level PyTorch utilities and custom autograd functions that implement core ray‑marching operations for neural rendering pipelines, covering ray composition, marching steps, Morton code encoding/decoding, near‑far clipping from axis‑aligned bounding boxes, run‑length packing, and conversion to spherical coordinates, with separate helpers for training and inference back‑ends.
business_intent: Accelerate and streamline the processing of massive ray collections in neural radiance field (NeRF) models, supporting efficient training and high‑quality rendering in multimodal AI systems.
